title: Canada : violent crime rate 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Violent crime rate has decreased over the Year.
Violent crime rate is roughly constant from 2004 to 2009, gradually decreasing from 2009 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly increasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Violent crime rate, of value 1404.21 was reached at Year 2004
Minimum Violent crime rate about 1044.23 was reached at Year 2014
min_summary: In general Violent crime rate has fallen over the Year.
